actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 70f of the Bankruptcy Act to provide that all sales of a bankrupt's property made by auction shall be made by an auctioneer selected through competitive bidding.

summary.text: Provides, under the Bankruptcy Act, that all sales of a bankrupt's property made by auction shall be made by an auctioneer selected through competitive bidding. (Amends 11 U.S.C. 110f)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 70f of the Bankruptcy Act to provide that all sales of a bankrupt's property made by auction shall be made by an auctioneer selected through competitive bidding.
